title: Subscription Upgraded
description: Fired when a subscription is upgraded to a higher-tier plan.

previousPlanId.description: Unique identifier of the previous subscription plan.

previousPlanName.description: Human-readable name of the previous subscription plan.

newPlanId.description: Unique identifier of the new subscription plan.

newPlanName.description: Human-readable name of the new subscription plan.

previousAmount.description: The monetary amount of the previous plan.

newAmount.description: The monetary amount of the new plan.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

prorated.description: Whether the upgrade charge was prorated.
